subject: Apple iLife : location information
text:
http://images.apple.com/legal/sla/docs/iLife11.pdf
on url, you can see on 4.B the following :
 Apple may provide certain services through the Apple Software that rely upon location information. 
To provide these services, and to improve our products, services or technologies for you, Apple and 
its partners may transmit, collect, maintain, process and use your location data. By using any 
location-based services in the Apple Software, you agree and consent to Apple's and its 
partners' transmission, collection, maintenance, processing and use of your location data to 
provide you with such services and to improve our products, services and technologies. The 
location data is collected in a form that does not personally identify you. You may withdraw this 
consent at any time by not using the location-based features.
-------
I don't want to be advertised by any service but I can't use the map display on my iPhoto without accepting that.
There is no technical need of giving my GPS datas to Apple to get the view of them on local map ; I only need that Apple share the map background to show it under my photo's pin.
